81  static bool IsWinZipAesEncryption(int iEncryptionMethod)
82  {
83  return iEncryptionMethod == encWinZipAes128 || iEncryptionMethod == encWinZipAes192 || iEncryptionMethod == encWinZipAes256;
84  }
